intro: Udora densa, commonly known as the dense udora, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions. It is characterized by its compact growth habit and dense foliage. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. Udora densa thrives in moist, well-drained soil and requires partial to full sunlight. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant in gardens and greenhouses due to its attractive appearance and ease of care.
